name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Fullstack Engineer with over 13 years of expertise in developing high-performance applications with a focus on frontend technologies like **React**, **TypeScript**, and **Redux**, alongside robust backend systems using **Node.js** and **Express**. Proficient in building responsive user interfaces with **HTML** and **CSS** and implementing APIs using **REST** and **GraphQL**. Experienced in database management with **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**.

Expert in CI/CD practices to streamline deployments and improve application performance and security. Demonstrated ability to integrate **AWS** cloud solutions and enhance applications’ functionality with tools like **Firebase**. Knowledgeable in compliance-driven development standards, ensuring solutions meet industry regulations. Additionally, skilled in Python for backend services, leveraging extensive performance optimization techniques. My strong background includes delivering projects that align with the latest web technologies and best practices.
